questions.question: Which city is Black Sabbath, Ozzy Osbourne's original band, famously from?

Who is Ozzy Osbourne's long-time wife and manager?

After Randy Rhoads' tragic death, who was the first guitarist to join Ozzy Osbourne's solo band?
Which song, a power ballad, is a well-known track from the "No More Tears" album?

options: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
questions.question: Ozzy Osbourne made a memorable cameo appearance in which 2000s comedy film?
What is the name of the heavy metal music festival founded by Ozzy and Sharon Osbourne?

What was Black Sabbath's first single, released in 1970?
On which Ozzy Osbourne album did Zakk Wylde make his debut as the lead guitarist?

options: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
questions.question: In 2006, Ozzy Osbourne was inducted into the UK Music Hall of Fame as a solo artist. Which other major Hall of Fame was he inducted into as part of Black Sabbath?
Who was the highly influential producer behind Ozzy Osbourne's early solo albums like "Blizzard of Ozz" and "Diary of a Madman"?

options: Bark at the Moon: My Story
Diary of a Madman: My Life
